https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nD0k5a4PQ35w355hOURfecba90Z.jpg The Musical Offering (German title: Musikalisches Opfer or Das Musikalische Opfer), BWV 1079, is a collection of canons and fugues and other pieces of music by Johann Sebastian Bach, all based on a single musical theme given to him by Frederick the Great (Frederick II of Prussia), to whom they are dedicated. Bach BWV 1079 Musical Offering Jordi Savall Concert des Nations
